<!-- AAX -->
<script type = "text/javascript">
	window.NXSTdata = window.NXSTdata || {};
	window.NXSTdata.ads = window.NXSTdata.ads || {};
	window.googletag = window.googletag || {};
	window.googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

	// AAX is enabled
	(function () {
		window.aax = window.aax || {};
		var aax = window.aax;
		aax.initTime = new Date().getTime();
		aax.pubId = "AAX44120O";
		aax.ver = "1.2";
		aax.hst = window.location.hostname;
		var aaxEndpoint = "https://c.aaxads.com/aax.js?pub=" + aax.pubId + "&hst=" + aax.hst + "&ver=" + aax.ver;
		function loadScript(endpoint) {
			var scriptTag = document.createElement("script"),
			placeTag = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
			scriptTag.type = "text/javascript";
			scriptTag.async = true;
			scriptTag.src = endpoint;
			placeTag.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptTag, placeTag);
		}
		loadScript(aaxEndpoint);
	})();

	aax.cmd = window.aax.cmd || [];
	aax.cmd.push(function () {
		if (aax.getAbpStatus && aax.getAbpStatus()) {
			// Update UDL; AAX active
			window.NXSTdata.ads.aaxStatus = 'recovered';
			googletag.cmd.push(function() {
				googletag.pubads().setTargeting('aax', 'recovered');
			});
		} else {
			// Update UDL: AAX not active
			window.NXSTdata.ads.aaxStatus = 'enabled';
			googletag.cmd.push(function() {
				googletag.pubads().setTargeting('aax', 'enabled');
			});
		}
	})


</script>

		httpPermissionRequest: {
			enable: true
		},
		notifyButton: {
			enable: false /* Set to false to hide */
		},
		promptOptions: {
			customlink: {
				enabled: true, /* Required to use the Custom Link */
				style: "button", /* Has value of 'button' or 'link' */
				size: "medium", /* One of 'small', 'medium', or 'large' */
				color: {
					button: '#E12D30', /* Color of the button background if style = "button" */
					text: '#FFFFFF', /* Color of the prompt's text */
				},
				text: {
					subscribe: "Subscribe to push notifications", /* Prompt's text when not subscribed */
					unsubscribe: "Unsubscribe from push notifications", /* Prompt's text when subscribed */
					explanation: "Get updates from all sorts of things that matter to you", /* Optional text appearing before the prompt button */
				},
				unsubscribeEnabled: true, /* Controls whether the prompt is visible after subscription */
			}
		}
	}]);
</script>

(function() {
	var _sf_async_config = window._sf_async_config = (window._sf_async_config || {});

	_sf_async_config.sections = "";
	_sf_async_config.authors = "";
	function loadChartbeat() {
			var e = document.createElement('script');
			var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			e.type = 'text/javascript';
			e.async = true;
			e.src = '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js';
			n.parentNode.insertBefore(e, n);
	}
	loadChartbeat();
})();
</script>

	// Static Queue Snippet

		!function(t,n){t[n]=t[n]||{nlsQ:function(e,o,c,r,s,i){return s=t.document,r=s.createElement("script"),r.async=1,r.src=("http:"===t.location.protocol?"http:":"https:")+"//cdn-gl.imrworldwide.com/conf/"+e+".js#name="+o+"&ns="+n,i=s.getElementsByTagName("script")[0],i.parentNode.insertBefore(r,i),t[n][o]=t[n][o]||{g:c||{},ggPM:function(e,c,r,s,i){(t[n][o].q=t[n][o].q||[]).push([e,c,r,s,i])}},t[n][o]}}}(window,"NOLBUNDLE");

<!-- LiveRamp ATS -->
<script>
var atsScript = document.createElement('script');
atsScript.onload = function() {
	window.ats.start({
		"placementID": "1262",
		"storageType": "localStorage",
		"detectionType": "scrapeAndUrl",
		"cssSelectors": [
			"input[type=text]",
			"input[type=email]"
		],
		"logging": "error",
		"urlParameter": "email"
	});
};
atsScript.src = 'https://ats.rlcdn.com/ats.js';
document.body.appendChild(atsScript);
</script>

	
<!-- Optimera -->
<script id="optimera-ops" src="https://d15kdpgjg3unno.cloudfront.net/oPS.js?cid=67" data-cid="67"></script>

			<aside class="ad-unit ad-unit--adhesion pre-render">
			<div class="ad-unit__content pre-render">
				<div class="close-btn-container--mobile">
					&#x2715;
				</div>
				<div class="close-btn-container">
					<div class="close-btn" aria-label="Close Viewport Adhesion Ad">&times; Close Ad</div>
				</div>

		</aside>
